title: Aero Glass for Windows 8.1
description:
Restore Aero Glass to Windows 8.1 without the annoying nag-screen and watermark.


Instructions:

- If you already have AeroGlass (by BigMuscle) installed, remove it (uninstall). Reboot and remove the C:AeroGlass folder.

- Run Aero.Glass.for.Windows.8.1.v.1.2.5.Final.exe

- You now have AeroGlass running. If you wish to tweak it a bit, use AeroGlassGUI.exe. 

- By default "win8rp.png" is installed in C:AeroGlass and used as Theme Atlas Image. If you do not like the look of that, you can copy "win8cp.png" from this torrent to C:AeroGlass and use the program AeroGlassGUI.exe to make that the Theme Atlas Image.
